document.full_text: cam ward stopped 40 shots for his third shutout of the season as the carolina hurricanes beat the buffalo sabres 1-0 on tuesday and closed in on the final playoff spot in the eastern conference.
document.title: ward shuts down sabres as canes make playoff push
lines_and_colors: cam ward stopped 40 shots for his third shutout of the season as the carolina hurricanes beat the buffalo sabres 1-0 on tuesday and closed in on the final playoff spot in the eastern conference.
